lead_paragraph: Funds that own 1 percent of Occidental Petroleum are targeting board seats at the fourth-largest U.S. oil company because of their concern about how it pays executives, one of the funds said on Monday, Reuters reported.
snippet: Funds that own 1 percent of Occidental Petroleum are targeting board seats at the fourth-largest U.S. oil company because of their concern about how it pays executives, one of the funds said on Monday.

headline.main: Two Funds Target Oxy Board Over Executive Pay

abstract: Funds that own 1 percent of Occidental Petroleum are targeting board seats at the fourth-largest U.S. oil company because of their concern about how it pays executives, one of the funds said on Monday.
